Posts.Content: hi please can you help me . im new here so im no sure if im posting in right place ,  but I been trying every where to find proper information on docetaxel . ive done my fect T which ive coped  well on   and jue to have docetaxel next week which im so so scared because ive heard such horrible stories ... im prepared to feel not well but is it really really bad .. it is scaring me so much , pluss  the steroid you have to take like 8 tablets a day ... please if there is any body who has had docetaxel  could give me some insight into it . thankyou jas x
Posts.Title: Chemo started!
